pullRequest.title: [shelly] Add channels device#deviceName, relay#outputName + refactoring
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds 2 new channels

deviceName and
channelName per relay channel

Those reflect the settings in the Shelly App and provide logical names for the device (all) and relay channels.
In addition Apache Comments (StringUtil+IOUtIOUtilsiul) was replaced by native code.

commit.message:
New channels device#deviceName and relay#channelName; skip button
trigger when binding was started; StringUtils replaced by native Java
string operations

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

Apache Commons IOUtils removed

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: deviceName sounds rather a property than a Channel.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -206,7 +206,8 @@ Every device has a channel group `device` with the following channels:
 
 |Group     |Channel            |Type    |read-only|Description                                                                      |
 |----------|-------------------|--------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
-|device    |uptime             |Number  |yes      |Number of seconds since the device was powered up                                |
+|device    |deviceName         |String  |yes      |Device name as configured in the Shelly App                                      |

nodes.bodyText: I'm a bit confused about the wording. If I see correctly, you don't mean an openHAB Channel, but something in Shelly what's called "channel", too. Is this a property, too? Same for below.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -330,6 +331,7 @@ Depending on the device type and firmware release channels might be not availabl
 |----------|-------------|---------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |relay     |output       |Switch   |r/w      |Controls the relay's output channel (on/off)                                     |
 |          |input        |Switch   |yes      |ON: Input/Button is powered, see General Notes on Channels                       |
+|          |channelName  |String   |yes      |Logical name of this channel as configured in the Shelly App                    ||

commit.message:
review comments applied

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

fix for substringBetween()

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

Fix for #8431: Handling of UBM for channels autoOn and autoOff

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

Need to run "mvn spotless:apply" again - strange, those files were not
modified with last commit

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>

Channel relay#channelName renamed to relay#outputName; channel
definition for Dimmer/Dimmer2 corrected (the is no group status anymore)

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>
